publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2957 Gordon Jackson: Glasgow City Council and Renfrewshire Council Boundaries (Braehead) Amendment Order 2002â€”That the Local Government Committee recommends that nothing further be done under the Glasgow City Council and Renfrewshire Council Boundaries (Braehead) Amendment Order 2002 (SSI 2002/156).
